title: How can philosophically driven ideas change our lives? - Quora

response.answer_text: Philosophically driven ideas give the ideology and direction to ones’ thinking. He can derive new ideas from this and form decisions on the basis of it which will in turn change the thinking as well as lifestyle of that person.

It all depends on the individuals. We all think, feel, and act differently. You have to seak different philosophical books or personal conversation or all other resources and study and find out on your own. For me, the best philosophy comes out of God’s words which is precise.
